These data are comprised of 152, adult, male Island Scrub Jays (*Aphelocoma insularis*). 

```{sh}

process_radtags \
-p /~/scratch_dir/ISSJs-genomics/raw \
-b /~/scratch_dir/ISSJs-genomics/barcodes \
-o /~/scratch_dir/ISSJs-genomics/process_samples/ \
--inline_null \
-i gzfastq \
-y gzfastq -e 'sbfI' -c -q -r -E 'phred33'

```
